meanings.definition: The angle formed by the intersection of two branches or limbs.
meanings.sent1: The crotch of the tree split into two branches.
meanings.sent2: He sat on the fence, feeling the rough crotch where the tree limbs met.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel balanced on the crotch of the tree, deciding which way to go.
meanings.sent4: The crotch of the river delta divided the flow into two distinct paths.
meanings.sent5: The hiker marveled at the crotch of the mountain where the trails diverged.

meanings.definition: The area where the legs meet the torso.
meanings.sent1: She felt a tickle in her crotch as she ran through the field.
meanings.sent2: He adjusted his pants at the crotch before heading out.
meanings.sent3: The cat napped in the warm sun, curling up in the crotch of the armchair.
meanings.sent4: The seamstress carefully measured the crotch of the pants for a perfect fit.
meanings.sent5: The baby giggled as she was lifted high, feeling the air under her crotch.
